articles.content:

articles.description: Imtiaz Ali said that he made Amar Singh Chamkila in Hindi because he wanted people outside of Punjab to also watch it.
articles.content: Imtiaz Alis latest directorial venture, Amar Singh Chamkila, is about to be released. The film stars Diljit Dosanjh and Parineeti Chopra in lead roles and the cast has created quite the excitement am… [+1813 chars]

articles.title: Mahesh Thakur says people were terrified of even walking close to Sridevi on Malini Iyer sets: ‘I had a suhagraat scene with her’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Mahesh Thakur recently revealed that nobody dared to even walk near his Malini Iyer co-star Sridevi and said that everyone thought of her as intimidating.

articles.description: Ranbir Kapoor recently reminisced about his father and the late actor Rishi Kapoor on The Great Indian Kapil Show. He also shared a memory of the only time his father disciplined him.
